member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Cache.HttpRuntimeCache.Set(System.String,System.Object,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 设置数据缓存 变化时间过期（平滑过期）。表示缓存连续2个小时没有访问就过期（TimeSpan.FromSeconds(7200)）.
member.param: 是否相对过期，默认是；否，则固定时间过期.

member.summary: 是否存在key，如果对应key的value值已过期，也返回false.
member.returns: true：存在key，并且value没过期；false：key不存在或者已过期.

member.name: P:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Config.ClientConfig.redirectUri
member.summary: 登录成功后的回调地址.

member.name: P:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Config.ClientConfig.alipayPublicKey
member.summary: 支付宝公钥：当选择支付宝登录时，该值可用 对应“RSA2(SHA256)密钥”中的“支付宝公钥”.

member.name: P:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Config.ClientConfig.unionId
member.summary:
是否需要申请unionid，目前只针对qq登录.
注：qq授权登录时，获取unionid需要单独发送邮件申请权限。如果个人开发者账号中申请了该权限，可以将该值置为true，在获取openId时就会同步获取unionId.
参考链接：http://wiki.connect.qq.com/unionid%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D.
1.7.1版本新增参数.

member.name: P:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Config.ClientConfig.agentId
member.summary:
企业微信，授权方的网页应用ID.
@since 1.10.0.

member.name: P:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Config.ClientConfig.scope
member.summary:
企业微信，授权方的网页应用ID.
@since 1.10.0.

member.name: T:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Config.IAuthSource
member.summary:
OAuth平台的API地址的统一接口，提供以下方法：.
1): 获取授权url. 必须实现.
2): 获取accessToken的url. 必须实现.
3): 获取用户信息的url. 必须实现.
4): 获取取消授权的url. 非必须实现接口（部分平台不支持）.
5): 获取刷新授权的url. 非必须实现接口（部分平台不支持）. 注：.
①、如需通过JustAuth扩展实现第三方授权，请参考自行创建对应的枚举类并实现接口.
②、如果不是使用的枚举类，那么在授权成功后获取用户信息时，需要单独处理source字段的赋值.
③、如果扩展了对应枚举类时，在中可以通过xx.toString()获取对应的source.

member.name: F:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Enums.AuthResponseStatus.SUCCESS
member.summary: 2000：正常； other：调用异常，具体异常内容见msg.

member.name: T:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Enums.AuthToutiaoErrorCode

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Request.IAuthRequest.authorize
member.summary:
返回授权url，可自行跳转页面.
不建议使用该方式获取授权地址，不带{@code state}的授权地址，容易受到csrf攻击.
建议使用{@link AuthDefaultRequest#authorize(string)}方法生成授权地址，在回调方法中对{@code state}进行校验.

member.summary: 返回带.state参数的授权url，授权回调时会带上这个.state.

member.summary: Provides an internal structure to sort the query parameter.

member.name: T:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.QueryParameterComparer
member.summary: Comparer class used to perform the sorting of the query parameters.

member.summary: Helper function to compute a hash value.
member.param: The hashing algoirhtm used. If that algorithm needs some initialization, like HMAC and its derivatives, they should be initialized prior to passing it to this function.
member.returns: a Base64 string of the hash value.

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.GetQueryParameters(System.String)
member.summary: Internal function to cut out all non oauth query string parameters (all parameters not begining with "oauth_").
member.param: The query string part of the Url.
member.returns: A list of QueryParameter each containing the parameter name and value.

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.UrlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: This is a different Url Encode implementation since the default .NET one outputs the percent encoding in lower case. While this is not a problem with the percent encoding spec, it is used in upper case throughout OAuth.

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.NormalizeRequestParameters(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.QueryParameter})
member.summary: Normalizes the request parameters according to the spec.
member.param: The list of parameters already sorted.
member.returns: a string representing the normalized parameters.

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.GenerateSignatureBase(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Generate the signature base that is used to produce the signature.
member.param: The full url that needs to be signed including its non OAuth url parameters.
The token, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string.
The token secret, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string.
The callback URL (for OAuth 1.0a).If your client cannot accept callbacks, the value MUST be 'oob'.
This value MUST be included when exchanging Request Tokens for Access Tokens. Otherwise pass a null or an empty string.
The http method used. Must be a valid HTTP method verb (POST,GET,PUT, etc).
The signature type. To use the default values use OAuthBase.SignatureTypes.

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.GenerateSignatureUsingHash(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm)
member.summary: Generate the signature value based on the given signature base and hash algorithm.
member.param: The signature based as produced by the GenerateSignatureBase method or by any other means.
The hash algorithm used to perform the hashing. If the hashing algorithm requires initialization or a key it should be set prior to calling this method.
member.returns: A base64 string of the hash value.

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.GenerateSignature(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Generates a signature using the HMAC-SHA1 algorithm.
member.param: The full url that needs to be signed including its non OAuth url parameters.
The token, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string.
The token secret, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string.
The callback URL (for OAuth 1.0a).If your client cannot accept callbacks, the value MUST be 'oob'.
This value MUST be included when exchanging Request Tokens for Access Tokens. Otherwise pass a null or an empty string.
The http method used. Must be a valid HTTP method verb (POST,GET,PUT, etc).
member.returns: A base64 string of the hash value.

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.GenerateSignature(System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.TwitterBase.SignatureTypes,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Generates a signature using the specified signatureType.
member.param: The full url that needs to be signed including its non OAuth url parameters.
The token, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string.
The token secret, if available. If not available pass null or an empty string.
The callback URL (for OAuth 1.0a).If your client cannot accept callbacks, the value MUST be 'oob'.
This value MUST be included when exchanging Request Tokens for Access Tokens. Otherwise pass a null or an empty string.
The http method used. Must be a valid HTTP method verb (POST,GET,PUT, etc).
The type of signature to use.
member.returns: A base64 string of the hash value.

member.summary: 初始化一个类型的新实例.

member.name: M:Poxiao.Extras.CollectiveOAuth.Utils.UrlBuilder.appendIfNotContain(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 如果给定字符串{@code str}中不包含{@code appendStr}，则在{@code str}后追加{@code appendStr}: 如果已包含{@code appendStr}，则在{@code str}后追加{@code otherwise}.
member.param: 当{@code appendStr}不满足时追加到{@code str}后的内容.
